pages.text: The Smithing Table is a default Minecraft block with some new features added by Alloygery.$(br2)Now, you can $(l:alloygery:upgrades_category)Upgrade$() your tools by placing a suitable material in the material slot. In conjunction with the $(l:tool_smithing_hammer)Smithing Hammer$(), you can remove said upgrades, and even disassemble tools to reclaim their $(l:alloygery:tool_parts_category)Tool Head$().

pages.title: Upgrade Gear
pages.text: You can $(l:alloygery:upgrades_category)Upgrade$() your tools by placing a suitable material in the material slot.

pages.title: Upgrade Removing
pages.text: You can remove any upgrades applied to a tool by using a $(l:tool_smithing_hammer)Smithing Hammer$().

pages.title: Gear Dismantling
pages.text: You can recover the tool head from a tool by using a $(l:tool_smithing_hammer)Smithing Hammer$().
